text: @JimMFelton An appalling headline. Does anyone at the @MailOnline know teachers or understand kids? And when were the Mail experts on epidemiology and coronavirus pathology? Unions are doing the right thing by asking questions the gov have failed to answer & wanting to protecting schools.
